alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Florence (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 21 at 9:02PM EDT until August 23 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Black Creek At Quinby affecting Florence and Darlington Counties. For the Black Creek...including Black Creek Nr Hartsville, Quinby... Minor flooding is forecast.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by tomorrow morning. SCC031-041-221915- /O.EXT.KILM.FL.W.0015.220823T0600Z-220823T1800Z/ /BCRS1.1.ER.220823T0600Z.220823T0600Z.220823T0600Z.NO/ 902 PM EDT Sun Aug 21 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Creek At Quinby. * WHEN...From late Monday night to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flood stage. Creek coming out of its banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
